text: was a Japanese actress. She was born in Urawa, Saitama. Her career began in 1996. She was best known for her roles as Tomoko in Ring (1998), Miss Sherlock (2018) and in FlashForward (2009–2010). Takeuchi committed suicide at her Tokyo apartment on September 27, 2020 at the age of 40. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:1980 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Suicides
title: Yūko Takeuchi
